MarkdownBlockBase.code_block: description: Explains the concept of an attached property in XAML, and provides some examples. title: Attached properties overview ms.assetid: 098C1DE0-D640-48B1-9961-D0ADF33266E2

Dim myC As Canvas = New Canvas() Dim myCheckBox As CheckBox= New CheckBox() myCheckBox.Content = "Hello" myC.Children.Add(myCheckBox) myCheckBox.SetValue(Canvas.TopProperty,75) ' Canvas.SetTop(myCheckBox, 75)
